sentences.en: Colin Welland's screenplay is faithful to the novel.
sentences.cn: 科林·韦兰的电影剧本忠实于原小说。

sentences.en: New approaches that have recently been demonstrated for the esophagus welland large bowel are described.
sentences.cn: 当前这一新的检查方法在食道、小肠、结肠中都有报道.

sentences.en: The project was completed welland we also made an extending studies for the future and continuity.
sentences.cn: 同时,在研究过程中做了相应的扩展,使项目的执行更具完备和延续性.

sentences.en: The system works welland has significances to energy saving and environmental protection.
sentences.cn: 本工程对节省能源和保护环境具有重要意义.

sentences.en: Welland gave an exasperated sigh and turned back.
sentences.cn: 韦兰十分烦恼地叹了口气，转过身去。

sentences.en: Welland made a pretence of writing a note in his pad.
sentences.cn: 韦兰假装在便笺薄上做笔记。

trans.tran_cn: 韦兰（加拿大东南部港口城市）
韦兰（加拿大东南部港市）（临韦兰运河） Canal 韦兰运河
